title: Citi Fourth Quarter 2023, and First Quarter, Second Quarter, Third Quarter and Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Calls
tag-1: Citi Fourth Quarter 2023, and First Quarter, Second Quarter, Third Quarter and Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Calls
tag-2: NEW YORK – Citigroup will issue its financial results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on the following dates:
tag-3: At 12 p.m. (ET) on January 12, and at 11 a.m. (ET) April 12, July 12, October 15, and January 15, 2025, results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference. The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event. Dial-in information will be provided at a later date.
tag-5: Citi is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in nearly 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
tag-6: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi
